title: Episode 218: Everything You Know About Aging is Wrong with Dr. Becca Levy
itunes:title: Episode 218: Everything You Know About Aging is Wrong with Dr. Becca Levy
description:
Dr. Becca Levy, author of Breaking The Age Code, joins Kate and Doree to discuss the ABC’s of aging, how positive age beliefs can impact physical function, the importance of building meaningful relationships across age and generation, and why “elder speak” needs to stop. Plus, Kate and Doree journey into the perfume scents of the season. 


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show or shopmyshelf.us/forever35.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! at forever35podcast.com/newsletter.
